name: Memory Battle (hulahoolgames)
description:
This game combines tower defense and card matching memory game genres. Your tower is under attack from Monstrous looking skulls that scream like hell when attacked. You have to match pair of cards and equip them in you inventory. Once a card is in your inventory you can drag it onto the grids and strategically place your attack or defense. Match all pairs before the skulls get you.

Download the game for windows and macOS from links below or just hit "Run Game" above to play in browser!
